official_title: A resolution to authorize Gene Tollefson, an employee in the office of Senator Jackson, to appear as a witness in the case of United States v. Edward Joseph Britt and James Paul Britt.

summary.text: Authorizes Gene Tollefson, an employee in the office of Senator Jackson, to appear as a witness in the case of United States v. Edward Joseph Britt and James Paul Britt.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize Gene Tollefson, an employee in the office of Senator Jackson, to appear as a witness in the case of United States v. Edward Joseph Britt and James Paul Britt.
